name: /dev/fd0
cooked:
I don’t see any benefits of using Cashu for mining payouts.

EthnTuttle:

Goals:

  • Auditability
  • Small payouts
  • Privacy

Auditability and small payouts are achieved with bolt12. LN privacy is debatable however use of Cashu to achieve privacy comes with the below trade-offs:

  • Custodial
  • Makes the mining pool vulnerable to regulatory actions or use of KYC/AML
topic_title: Ecash TIDES using Cashu and Stratum v2
topic_html_title: Ecash TIDES using Cashu and Stratum v2
raw:
I don't see any benefits of using Cashu for mining payouts.

[quote="EthnTuttle, post:1, topic:870"]
Goals:

* Auditability
* Small payouts
* Privacy
[/quote]

Auditability and small payouts are achieved with [bolt12](https://ocean.xyz/docs/lightning). LN privacy is debatable however use of Cashu to achieve privacy comes with the below trade-offs:

- Custodial
- Makes the mining pool vulnerable to regulatory actions or use of KYC/AML
